title: How to Get Final Form in Kingdom Hearts 2

steps.title: Go to Twilight Town after it has reappeared.
steps.content: Go to Twilight Town after it has reappeared.

steps.title: Follow the steps to get to The World That Never Was, and reach Memory's Skyscraper.
steps.content: Follow the steps to get to The World That Never Was, and reach Memory's Skyscraper.

steps.title: There will be a cut scene, and if you have Final Mix a boss fight, and then it will go to normal.
steps.content: There will be a cut scene, and if you have Final Mix a boss fight, and then it will go to normal.

steps.title: In Final Mix after the boss battle you will also get a new keyblade which increases your chance of going into Final Form.
steps.content: In Final Mix after the boss battle you will also get a new keyblade which increases your chance of going into Final Form.

steps.title: Go to The Colosseum and enter the Cerberus Cup
steps.content: Go to The Colosseum and enter the Cerberus Cup

steps.title: Simply pull up the drive menu and hit Master Form
steps.content: Simply pull up the drive menu and hit Master Form

steps.title: If you do not get Final Form, simply hit start and hit retry.
steps.content: If you do not get Final Form, simply hit start and hit retry. This restarts the tournament, and you have a full drive gauge. This eliminates any need to refill you drive gauge, and it provides you a fun environment to get your first taste of final form

steps.title: Be sure you've made it to the World That Never Was.
steps.content: Be sure you've made it to the World That Never Was.

steps.title: Randomly access the other forms, and the final will appear.
steps.content: Randomly access the other forms, and the final will appear.
